meanings.definition: Most wooden in nature or quality.
meanings.sent1: The woodenest chair in the room creaked when I sat on it.
meanings.sent2: The old barn had the woodenest walls I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The woodenest tree in the forest was known for its stubbornness in bending with the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her expression was the woodenest I had ever seen, revealing no emotion.
meanings.sent5: The woodenest ruler in the classroom was so rigid, it could almost be mistaken for a piece of wood.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the toys, the woodenest doll was her favorite.
meanings.sent2: The woodenest fence in the neighborhood needed a fresh coat of paint.
meanings.sent3: The woodenest spoon in the drawer always seemed to stir up trouble.
meanings.sent4: His voice was the woodenest I had ever heard, lacking any warmth or emotion.
meanings.sent5: The woodenest mask at the masquerade ball was so lifelike, it fooled everyone.
